title: गुजरात से विधायक जिग्नेश मेवाणी ने पीएम मोदी के इंदौर यात्रा की फोटोशॉप तस्वीर साझा की
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: It is always wonderful to meet Dr. Syedna Mufaddal Saifuddin. Saint and scholar, his commitment towards nation building is appreciable. He is at the forefront of several community service initiatives. pic.twitter.com/qLUUJN6Lpw
